com.ephesoft.dcma.security.service.impl

Class BasicAuthorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.security.service.impl.AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer
      • com.ephesoft.dcma.security.service.impl.BasicAuthorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationService

    public class BasicAuthorizer
extends AbstractEphesoftAuthorizer
    Provides the implementation for the AuthorizationService.

    It implements the basic authorisation provided by Ephesoft.

    Version:
    1.0 $LastChangedDate:$
    $LastChangedRevision:$
    Author:
    Ephesoft created on 18-Nov-2013

    • Method Detail

      • getUserRoles

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserRoles(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationService
        Gets all the user roles available in the configured authentication type.

        It also saves the fetched user roles in the session for further use.

        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used to save the fetched result in session.
        Returns:
        NULL in case of errors otherwise set of user roles.

      • isSuperAdmin

        public boolean isSuperAdmin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationService
        Checks if the current logged in user has a super-admin role or not.

        It also save the result in session for further use.

        Parameters:
        httpServletRequest - HttpServletRequest request attribute used to save the fetched result in session.
        Returns:
        false in case of errors otherwise respective result.
